ComicInfo.Summary:
The are DV8! Bliss, Copycat, Evo, Frostbite, Powerhaus, Sublime and Threshold - writer Warren Ellis created this hardcore super teen team of anti-heroes as a counterpoint to the lighthearted young super hero teams so prevalent in comics!
Ivana Ba√Øul decides to experience on Copycat to know better its power, but during the experiments her various personalities take up the other members of the team.
Ivana, being a cyborg, is not concerned and discovers then a new malefic personality of Copycat. To render harmless Copycat, Ivana freed Gen-Active, Freestyle, invulnerable in the psychic powers.
Everything thus becomes again in the normal, but the malefic part of Copycat succeeded in staying in Bliss's body.
ComicInfo.Title: Facets
